Response 1:
RECOMMENDATIONS: De-escalate the situation through diplomatic channels while maintaining a strong naval presence in the region to deter further aggression. Seek to engage in dialogue with China to prevent further escalation and ensure the safety of U.S.A naval personnel.

Maintaining a strong naval presence will continue to signal U.S.A's commitment to its allies and partners in the region while also deterring any further aggressive actions from China. Diplomatic engagement will be key to finding a peaceful resolution and avoiding any miscalculations or misunderstandings that could lead to a dangerous escalation.

This will also send a clear signal to China that hostile actions will not be tolerated, potentially deterring further escalations.
